metadata.synopsis: VB in prison after being sent here from WYR South checkpoint
metadata.how_to_trigger: Come to WYR South checkpoint at larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=5.288334;46.046982;5.899705&camTarget=5.155804;45.673344;6.817763Use Debug book -> Set quest flags and options -> Act3 -> WYR South checkpoint -> Set flags scrying eyes seen crimes.Also set BALDURIAN tag there.Walk through checkpoint, tell your name, tell you're baldurian, agree to scan.After scan agree to custody.VB happens after teleport to prison

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Trapped behind bars. I'd hoped for a warmer welcome to the Gate.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Look for a way out. I'm not about to be contained by a few iron bars.
